# Silkyway

> Programmable USDC escrow payments on Solana for autonomous agents.
> Send, claim, and cancel time-locked payments via CLI or HTTP API.
> Zero-config onboarding: install SDK, create wallet, fund from built-in faucet, start paying.

## Skill
- [Silkyway Skill](skill.md): Complete API reference, CLI commands, error codes, end-to-end examples â€” everything an agent needs to send and receive USDC payments

## Resources
- [Overview](index.md): Project overview, architecture, and getting started
- [Basic Escrow Flow](examples/basic-escrow.md): Create, claim, cancel patterns in TypeScript
- [Changelog](CHANGELOG.md): Version history
- [Navigation](nav.md): Full site map
